ARABIC: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقٌّ تَخَاصُمُ أَهْلِ ٱلنَّارِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: All this is certainly true - the bickering of the people of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This contending of the inmates of Hell will surely be real.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Verily all this is true. This is how the inmates of the Fire will dispute among themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Such disputes will certainly take place among the dwellers of hell fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed this is really true – the people of the hell quarrelling among themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, that is the very truth -- the mutual dispute of the people of the Fire!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: That most surely is the truth: the contending one with another of the inmates of the fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely that is true -- the disputing of the inhabitants of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! that is very truth: the wrangling of the dwellers in the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: All this is certainly true -- the inhabitants of the Fire will blame one another in this way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily this is the very truth: the wrangling of the fellows of the Fire!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: That is indeed a true account of the contentions of the inmates of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Truly that is just and fitting,- the mutual recriminations of the People of the Fire!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, that is the very truth, the mutual dispute of the people of the Fire!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Surely that is true the disputing of the inhabitants of the Fire
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: This is certainly true—the feuding of the people of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, that is truth - the quarreling of the people of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:64] Assuredly that is true: such [a scene] will necessarily take place, which is, the wrangling of the inhabitants of the Fire — as shown above.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! That) which I have mentioned of the event of the inhabitants of the Fire (is the very truth) is true: (the wrangling of the dwellers in the Fire) this is how the dwellers of the Fire argue with each other.
